name.ja: <ruby>電<rt>でん</rt></ruby><ruby>脳<rt>のう</rt></ruby><ruby>加<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>速<rt>そく</rt></ruby><ruby>器<rt>き</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: This card's effect cannot be negated.

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up Machine Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains 300 ATK. If the equipped monster's original name is "Jinzo", its Continuous Effect becomes "Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards, and their Trap Card effects are negated".
